title: Replace Size status with copyable task ID in specs management window
description: In the specs management window under 'Task Breakdown', replace the 'Size' status in the upper right with the task ID and add a small copy icon next to it. When clicked, it should copy the task ID to clipboard.

title: Replace emoji with lucide icon in Specs Management Table Status column
description: In the Specs Management Table, replace the emoji in the Status column with the equivalent lucide icon
